metadata.Title: CVE-2020-25692 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A NULL pointer dereference was found in OpenLDAP server and was fixed in openldap 2.4.55, during a request for renaming RDNs. An unauthenticated attacker could remotely crash the slapd process by sending a specially crafted request, causing a Denial of Service.

criterions.comment: openldap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
